User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://costflowai.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /config/

# Allow all construction cost calculators
Allow: /calculators/
Allow: /calculators/concrete/
Allow: /calculators/drywall/
Allow: /calculators/paint/
Allow: /calculators/insulation/
